mapper.select: SELECT B.BD_NO, COUNT(R.REPORT_NO) CNT, B.BD_TITLE, B.M_NO, C.NAME FROM REPORT R, BOARD B, BOARDCATEGORY C WHERE R.BD_NO = B.BD_NO AND B.BC_CODE=C.CODE GROUP BY B.BD_NO, B.BD_TITLE,B.M_NO,C.NAME
SELECT A.REPORT_NO, A.NAME, A.BD_TITLE, A.REPORT_REASON, A.REPORT_DATE, B.M_NICKNAME, A.M_NO FROM REPORT A JOIN IT_MEMBER B ON A.M_NO=B.M_NO WHERE A.BD_NO=#{bd_no}
